attributes.action: stop this absurd law to allow peopole to come into our homes for the sole reason of council tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am flabbergasted that this goverment think its ok to come into my home and take pictures of my house , i do not think they should be allowered to go into my childrens bedrooms, information on my house culd be used by all sorts of people with diffrent motives invasion of my privacy
